author: Sapp Family
comment: This is a life saver to get the notifications I need and not be overwhelmed with the clutter.

author: Daniel Schmidt
comment: Great app, works well, never miss an alert or important message.  Great for oncall people

author: Jack Singh
comment: This is a good App. I use it for text and email alerts. Quite comprehensive app.  Emailed developer regarding a minor issue and was prompt with his reply. Definitely recommend this app. One thing I do wish fixed is the length of time notification bar shows the exclamation mark before it disappears. I have to quickly get to my device before the alert in the notification bar disappears. If I miss it then I have to try to catch it during the next alert cycle. It has kinda become a game now. lol. Regardless it a good app and I hope one day Glen can include missed call alerts as well

author: Simon Nattrass
comment: Only thing I have found disappointing is that the notification pop up cancels repeating sound alerts so that you cannot effectively have both. If you want repeating sound alerts you cannot have pop up notification. Unless I don't know how but I tried for days lol and couldnt do it.

author: richard martin
comment: Excellent tool for anybody that does after hours support and relies on getting notified for urgent issues. Offers same functionality the the blackberry P1 notifications but for sms as well.

author: Lid Nat
comment: does what I need

author: Charles Feerick
comment: I'm only interested in work email notifications and this gives that to me, with specific sounds.  The reading of the subject is, while creepy when around others, is very effective if your alone.  Great customer support, frequently updated with corrections and enhancements.  I've been using it for 3+ years on my Samsung Galaxy phones.

author: Luis Izquierdo
comment: I absolutely LOVE this app. I am a work at home graphic designer and was losing work because my default notifications were either too low or not going off at all and I kept missing emails and would not find them until the next day or two. With this app,  it makes it IMPOSSIBLE for me to miss an email now. Definitely worth getting the full version, not because it's ad free (which is a Plus) but because I feel the developers deserve the support on such a well made app!  -ZTE Grand Maxx +

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Luis! I'm glad that it is helping to make life easier.  I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need anything. Cheers, Glen

author: Robert Collins
comment: This is a great program for when you have to know what is going on. I have been using the lite version for months and decided to get the paid version. I would love to see one addition and that is a formula style alert ie. email=name@domain AND (body OR subject)=keyword.

author: Kyle Smith
comment: I work in systems operations, and I have been using eNotify for the past year and a half to monitor my email and alert me when we have systems issues. eNotify is a comprehensive app that allows you to tailor your alerts to any need. The developer has been very responsive to support issues.

author: Steve Recsky
comment: I am on-call for many different clients and receive many different types of emails that require different tones and different schedules. This app handles it all. Also, the developer is extremely responsive and quick with fixes where warranted. Operating system upgrades are also handled in a timely manner. I highly recommend this if you want customized notifications based on email content, sender and receiver values.

author: Jon Hux
comment: I love this app and it is critical for work now, however it has not worked for me since I was upgraded to Android 8.0. App just says out of date and closes and I have no way to contact the dev. Please fix ASAP.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Jon. Sorry about that. I uploaded the Android 8 version to GooglePlay last night. Is it appearing in the Play app? If not, I'll give you a link to a copy of the app on our private servers. Contact me at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need the link or have any questions. Regards, Glen

author: Martin Richards
comment: It works quite well. Sometimes an update will cause it to freeze on an acceptance screen that you can't see until you open the app, which doesn't make sense. Otherwise does signify emails and texts

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Martin. The acceptance screen that is freezing is part of the Android framework. So that's an issue on Google's end and not something we can likely control. But if you have any issues with emails and texts I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com. Regards, Glen

author: rakesh singh
comment: When i come out of do not disturb it alerts for all old messages and keeps ringing for few minutes. I dont need to know about messages while i m in dnd. Pls fix

author: Brandt Winchell
comment: This is the best email notification tool for any phone outside of a Blackberry.  The ability to customize what emails will alert with different tones and each on a different time frame, is exactly what is needed

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Brandt for your support. BlackBerry provided excellent email capabilities. I've received quite a few emails from former BlackBerry users over the years thanking us providing some of that support that is missing on Android. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Jeremie Bedard
comment: Perfect for IT staff actively monitoring system failures by email alerts. Awesome app.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Jeremie. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you guys ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: William Guisao
comment: I love it but please let us have more control on how to customise it

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks William. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you want to suggest additional customisations. It has been a lot of work keeping the current options working due to the many changes in the notification framework, silent profile and restrictions on background processing. But we do our best. Regards, Glen

author: Patrick Elliott
comment: Super convenient for notifying of emails of high importance.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks for your support Patrick. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Randy Fink
comment: Great for on-call alerts and web cam alerts

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Randy. On-call users have suggested many of the best triage features in the app.  I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Matthew Cleveland
comment: It works

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Matthew. i'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Andrew Willerding
comment: Excellent, highly configurable and reliable

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Andrew. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need any assistance. Regards, Glen

author: Alexandru Butică
comment: Really excellent!

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Alexandru. We are at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need anything.

author: Adeel Mirza
comment: This app is perfect for my needs and Glen takes the credit for providing great support!

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Adeel. I do my best :) Don't hesitate to contact us again if you need anything in the future. Regards, Glen

author: Greg D
comment: Great app with frequent updates.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Greg. We've just posted the Android 8 version. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Rob Lastname
comment: Used to be a lot better.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Rob. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you want to report an issue. I noticed that you're on the newest version 4.58 which is on a partial roll-out at the moment. Please let me know if there are any problems with that version so that other folks do not experience them. Thanks, Glen

author: Jan Dujardin
comment: This app is absolutely brilliant! If you're waiting for urgent messages that you have to act upon fast, look no further, this is your solution. Just configure it to alert you to those specific messages that require your immediate attention and bammm... people will be amazed how fast you react. Being on call has never been so low stress. It's also nice to see that the app is being actively developed and improved. Blown away!

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks for your support Jan. We just posted the Android 8 version last night. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: leeju hsu
comment: It was great but started to miss some mails, so that I upgraded to a pay version and it still failed to notify me. I did excluded it from battery optimization. Still, it only works when I open the app. I missed a lot of important mails. :(

Email control ? It doesn't get any better !! This is the app for total control of incoming email notifications. We have searched for weeks for an app to do what this app does .... never found anything even close. We had some very exacting requirements. This app met and exceeded all requirements. I would give it a 10 rating !!  Love it !! Thank you developer !!!

author: David Friedeck
comment: The free version was more reliable than the pay for version very disappointing. Would switch back but advertising would over run the phone. Really not happy it misses key emails.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi David. Free and paid are the same app. No difference except for ads and disabled features. The lite version you received is newer than the full. Lite users test new versions of the app to ensure existing full users do not experience defects. Contact me to receive the latest full version: android_support@verietassoftware.com. Regards, Glen

author: Sylvia Genders
comment: I would like my money back because it won't run properly, and it won't manage notifications, of which I only wanted a few. EG, my FB notifications have been annoying me all day, which is what I did NOT want and why I bought the app.
The developer is very attentive to fixing bugs and the app is immensely configurable. The best alerting solution for being on-call I've found.
title: Highly configurable alerting

author: Eric Bartlett
comment: Amazing app.  And best customer service i have EVER had with any app.  High configuration.  Worth every penny, this guy deserves it

author: Dan MacNeil
comment: Developer got back to me quickly on a weekend with helpful info
title: Great support for $5

author: Steve Hyde
comment: Works great.  Dev support was highly responsive when I reported a bug too.

author: Dan Heitke-Felbeck
comment: No problems so far. Great how it can do SMS or email.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Dan. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Anne Bennett
comment: Extremely flexible triggers - exactly what I needed.

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Thanks Anne. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com if you ever need anything. Regards, Glen

author: Brian W.
comment: Awesome app, and one worth purchasing.

author: Bill Swann
comment: Excellent program
title: Very nice

author: Evo E
comment: Very useful app to monitor important messages in a number of useful ways. Just one suggestion - can u add text to speach features e.g. when i get a pop up with message content the app reads it aloud so i dont have to look at the screen. Once the message is read aloud the app automaticaly processes and reads aloud the next message etc.                          --------      Thank you Glen i found and tested the text to speach option and can say this app is truly indispensable and fills an important void

reply.author: Varietas Software, LLC
reply.content: Hi Evo. Thanks. The app can read the full message out loud. Click on "Bell Chime" or the name of your current sound and find the option "Text to Speech" above the sound names.Click on "Configure Text to Speech" to choose the parts of the message that you want read. I'm at android_support@verietassoftware.com. Regards, Glen

title: Very useful

author: Derek Jordan W
comment: This app has become indispensable to me. I would consider it one of the crucial, core apps that needs to be installed right away when starting with a fresh phone. Extremely versatile, excellent feature set, active development with topnotch support. Definitely worth the purchase!
